channel.title: Need help with making Pk areas!?!
channel.description: I have a pk source. Ultimate Pk. I want to add a pk place in the actual wilds and no where else. How would I do that?

item.title: Need help with making Pk areas!?!
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Irl1 Owned Irl
item.description:
@Owned_Irl1 wrote:

search in your client.java

for Nonwild

you should see this underneath

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

replace that with this

public boolean nonWild() { if (absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112) return true; else return false; }

save and compile… now you have normal pk areas…

any questions please pm me

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with making Pk areas!?!
